definition: to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
Tibet/Xizang or Tibetan autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区
to hide/to conceal/to mask/to shelter/to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden)/to hide oneself/to lie low/to nestle/hidden/implicit/private/covert/recessed (lighting)
to hold in store/to contain (untapped reserves etc)
to cover up/to conceal/to go into hiding
Tibetan autonomous region, Tibetan: Bod rang skyong ljongs, abbr. 藏[Zang4], capital Lhasa 拉薩|拉萨[La1 sa4]
to hide/to go into hiding/to take refuge

sentences.english: To simulate the Force, technicians hid devices on "Kenobi's" person.
sentences.chinese: 为了模拟原力，技术人员在“克诺比”身上藏了仪器。

sentences.english: The cons cover the hole and hide the concrete.
sentences.chinese: 团伙们掩盖了洞口将混凝土藏好。

sentences.english: That night the smallest rabbit hid in the grass by the pool.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上，最小的兔子藏在小池边的矮树丛里。

sentences.english: Blue sky to secure them, Yin three hid in the hotel yard.
sentences.chinese: 为保安全，尹三将蓝天藏在旅馆后院里。

sentences.english: My friends who got under the bed and under desks were crushed to death …
sentences.chinese: 我的友朋们，这些藏在床下，桌女下的人皆死了。

sentences.english: On the two sides of the Heaven Palace are Bell Tower and Runner Tibet.
sentences.chinese: 天王殿两侧分别是钟楼和转轮藏。

sentences.english: He just hides them down the back of his shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他只是把它们都藏到了衬衫后面。

sentences.english: The wheat Chai hilt, like a sword ordinary, straight wear kitano musashi throat.
sentences.chinese: 麦子的钗柄如利剑普通，直穿北野武藏的喉咙。

sentences.english: Maybe he is stashed away in the wardrobe.
The Butter Lantern Festival is an important component of Tibetan folk culture.
sentences.chinese: 酥油花灯会是藏民族民俗文化的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The settlers say terrorists hide among the trees.
sentences.chinese: 定居者说有恐怖分子藏在树丛里。

sentences.english: Keeps thee here in dark to be his paramour?
sentences.chinese: 把你藏在这暗洞里做他的情妇？

sentences.english: With Meher Baba's great love in our hearts, external disasters can't harm us.
sentences.chinese: 有美赫巴巴之大恋爱藏在内心中，无外灾可伤害。

sentences.english: The buddies start to wonder where he's been hiding the money.
sentences.chinese: 那些球友们开始怀疑他哪里藏了这么多钱。

sentences.english: Be careful, there still is a snake in brushwood.
sentences.chinese: 当心，草丛中还藏着一条蛇呢。

sentences.english: I noticed, behind the neutrality of his gaze, a deep weariness.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到他不露声色的注视背后藏着深深的厌倦。

definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
repository of items of cultural significance/collection
interpreting words/to explain the meaning of words in classic texts/to decipher an old script
to record/to put down in writing
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
